review:
I am extremely satisfied with this Doctor. He is extremely skillful and has immense knowledge in his subject. I am a patient of Dilated Cardiomyopathy and was referred to a Cardiologist by my family physician. Interestingly the Cardiologist I consulted was asking me to get 'n' number of tests done and changing medicines without no symptomatic improvement. I was completely frustrated with such a unyielding management technique.
One of my colleagues referred to Dr. Patra and I was astonished to know I was suffering from Resistant Heart Failure that was causing multiple hospitalisations. He suggested me to go for Implantation of ICD device . It was the latest discovery in the science of Cardiology and have prolonged life of patients like mine.
I got the device implanted in the month of January this year and its almost 10 months I am practically free from any symptoms. This was a miraculous operation he had done on me. Even my friends and colleagues are surpised regarding my health as they had seen me most of the time getting admitted in ICU of different Hospitals of the city
I would strongly recommend Dr. Patra to everyone seeking for Cardiological Advice.

I consulted Dr. Patra for my Mother who was suffering from Chronic Angina. Whenever she used to walk faster she used to have chest pain. We had consulted 2 more cardiologists whi tried to get an ANGIOPLASTY done somehow or other and we were forced to do the angiography. There was heavy bleeding from the puncture site and she had to prolong her stay due such a mishap.
One of our friends recommended about Dr. Patra and when we consulted him we were astonished to find that the CD of the angiography done was previous doctor was partially done and the pictures were for only one artery. 
We got an ANGIOGRAPHY done by him and that too through radial artery. It was an absolute painless process. He explained us the choice between ANGIOPLASTY and BY PASS Surgery. Over last 10 months my mother is under his treatment and we had never done any angioplasty. He regularly optimises the medicines my mother is taking and she is practically pain free. I have seen my mother breaking stairs upto 2 storey building without any pain or shoprtness of breath. 
This consultation have saved us lakhs of rupees. If we had fallen prey to any of those malpractising cardiologists, my mother would have suffered and unwanted operation and debility.
I will always remain thankful to Dr. Patra for his effort.

review: I was beyond impressed with my experience at dr Soumya Patra.This is the first time I visit and I was completely blown away by how helpful and kind he was.now on to the appointment my appointment ran on time, dr. Patra made me fell comfortable through out the appointment.I would highly recommend dr. Patra.

review: My home is in Alipurduar town in North Bengal.  My cousin had heart blockage, heart specialist Dr. Soumya Patra is a doctor I know.  So I went to Dr. Soumya Patra for treatment.  On the 9th of this month the doctor had an apartment.  Doctor Patra responsibly performed angioplasty on my uncle's heart on the same day and the uncle's surgery was completed very successfully.  I am forever grateful to Dr. Patra.  I must tell everyone that Dr. Soumya Patra is a very good heart specialist surgeon, moreover, his speech is very beautiful.  The family of any patient can safely trust Dr. Patra.  Thank you very much Dr. Soumya Patra
